ygData.subject: Re: mana
ygData.msgSnippet: It happens the minute you put it on. :) otherwise everytime you died, you would have to level again to gain it back...and heaven forbid you removed a piece of
ygData.messageBody:
It happens the minute you put it on. :) otherwise everytime you died, you
would have to level again to gain it back...and heaven forbid you removed a
piece of equipment :)

----- Original Message -----
From: phrederick <fire3@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 2:11 PM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] mana


> From: phrederick <fire3@...>
>
> does the mana you have get increased immediately when you
> add +int equipment, or does it only increase it after you
> level? what i mean is, do you get the same increase for
> getting a +2 int earing and first wearing it at level 15,
> as you would if you have had it since level 1?
